what: Data Package of the PhonItalia 1.10 Corpus
title: Data Package of the PhonItalia 1.10 Corpus
text: package provides user phonitalia data frame, contains data PhonItalia 1.10 Corpus, additional phonemic trasncriptions added Stefano Coretta. Goslin, J., Galluzzi, C. & Romani, C. PhonItalia: phonological lexicon Italian. Behav Res 46, 872–886 (2014). https://doi.org/10.3758/s13428-013-0400-8

title: Data Package of the PhonItalia 1.10 Corpus
text: can install phonItaliaR like : : Check documentation data ?phonitalia.
code: remotes::install_github("stefanocoretta/phonItaliaR") library(tidyverse) library(phonItaliaR) data("phonitalia") phonitalia #> # A tibble: 120,000 × 64 #>    PhonesIPA PhonesIPA_gem PhonesToken PhonesToken_gem PhoneSyllIPA wordSpell #>    <chr>     <chr>         <chr>       <chr>           <chr>        <chr>     #>  1 a         a             a           a               a            a         #>  2 a         a             a           a               a            a         #>  3 a         a             a           a               a            a         #>  4 a         a             a           a               a            a         #>  5 a         a             a           a               a            a         #>  6 a         a             a           a               a            a         #>  7 a         a             a           a               a            a         #>  8 a         a             a           a               a            a         #>  9 a         a             a           a               a            a         #> 10 a         a             a           a               a            a         #> # ℹ 119,990 more rows #> # ℹ 58 more variables: nLem <dbl>, fqTot <dbl>, fqTotL <dbl>, fqQuo <dbl>, #> #   fqPer <dbl>, fqLib <dbl>, dispT <dbl>, dispQ <dbl>, dispP <dbl>, #> #   dispL <dbl>, fqRelT <dbl>, fqRelQ <dbl>, fqRelP <dbl>, fqRelL <dbl>, #> #   rango <dbl>, lung <dbl>, gramCat <chr>, lemma <chr>, word <chr>, #> #   Phones <chr>, PhoneSyll <chr>, checked <dbl>, NumLetters <dbl>, #> #   NumPhones <dbl>, SumSylls <dbl>, StressedSyllable <dbl>, OrthVCV <chr>, …

what: phonItalia: A phonological lexicon for Italian — phonitalia
title: phonItalia: A phonological lexicon for Italian — phonitalia
text: provides users annotated lexical data PhonItalia 1.10 Corpus. Corpus annotated phonological information like syllabic parsing, stress frequency information. Phonemic transcriptions added Stefano Coretta (see details ).

title: phonItalia: A phonological lexicon for Italian — phonitalia
phonItalia: A phonological lexicon for Italian — phonitalia
text: tibble 120,000 observations 61 variables. PhonesIPA IPA transcription word. PhonesIPA_gem PhoneIPA geminates represented <ː>. PhoneSyllIPA PhoneIPA syllable boundaries marked <.>. PhonesToken Tokenised PhonesIPA. Phones separated space. PhonesToken_gem PhoneToken PhonesIPA_gem. wordSpell Standard spelling word. nLem associated lemma index number assigned Colfis word forms. number can used match wordform lemma Colfis lemma database. fqTot Total absolute frequency word form. fqTotL Total log frequency word form. fqQuo Absolute frequency newspapers. fqPer Absolute frequency periodical magazines. fqLib Absolute frequency books. dispT Dispersion total frequency. dispQ Dispersion frequency newspapers. dispP Dispersion frequency periodical magazines. dispL Dispersion frequency books. fqRelT Relative total frequency. fqRelQ Relative frequency newspapers. fqRelP Relative frequency periodical magazines. fqRelL Relative frequency books. rango Word form index number Colfis. lung Number characters orthographic word form word excluding '. gramCat Grammatical category following classifications: B Adverb, C Conjunction, E Noun, G Adjective, Interjection, N Pronoun, P Preposition, K Punctuation, R Article, S Substantive, V Verb, X identified, Z Symbol, NU Numeral, TC Composed verb, VA Auxilliary verb, U unknown, @ syntagmatic word (used combination another code, example S E@, noun syntagmatic word). lemma Orthographic representation lemma associated word form. word Orthographic word form. Phones phonological representation word form. PhoneSyll Phonological representation word form syllable boundaries .. checked Word-forms changes previous version: 1,2 change word-form version 1.01 1.10, 11,12,111,112 change made syllable stress position, 101,102,111,112 change made phonemic representation. NumLetters Number letters word. NumPhones Number phones word. SumSylls Number syllables word. StressedSyllable Numeric index stressed syllable. OrthVCV consonant vowel structure orthographic representation word. PhonVCV Consonant vowel structure phonological representation word. OrthUniq Orthographic uniqueness point. PhonUniq Phonological uniqueness point. OrthUniqM1 Orthographic uniqueness point minus one. PhonUniqM1 Phonological uniqueness point minus one. NumHomographs Number homographs. NumHomophones Number homophones. Orth_N Size orthographic neighbourhood. Orth_N_MFreq Mean log frequency orthographic neighbourhood. Orth_N_G Number orthographic neighbours higher frequency thanthe word. Orth_N_L Number orthographic neighbours lower frequency word. Orth_N_G_MFreq Mean log frequency orthographic neighbours lower frequency word. Orth_N_L_MFreq Mean log frequency orthographic neighbours higher frequency word. Orth_N_RelFreq Relative log frequency current word orthographic neighbourhood. Phon_N Size phonological neighbourhood. Phon_N_MFreq Mean log frequency phonological neighbourhood. Phon_N_G Number phonological neighbours higher frequency word. Phon_N_L Number phonological neighbours lower frequency word. Phon_N_G_MFreq Mean log frequency phonological neighb lower frequency word. Phon_N_L_MFreq Mean log frequency phonological neighbours higher frequency word. Phon_N_RelFreq Relative log frequency current word phonological neighbourhood. OLD Orthographic Levenshtein Distance 20. OLDF Mean log frequency words 20 words used calculate OLD. OLD_RelFreq Relative log frequency word 20 used calculate OLD. PLD Phonological Levenshtein Distance 20. PLDF Mean log frequency words 20 words used calculate PLD. PLD_RelFreq Relative log frequency word 20 used calculate PLD. BG_Sum ? BG_Mean ? BP_Sum ? BP_Mean ?

title: phonItalia: A phonological lexicon for Italian — phonitalia
text: Goslin, J., Galluzzi, C. & Romani, C. PhonItalia: phonological lexicon Italian. Behav Res 46, 872–886 (2014). https://doi.org/10.3758/s13428-013-0400-8

title: phonItalia: A phonological lexicon for Italian — phonitalia
text: data package enhanced phonemic transcriptions word. following types transcriptions added: transcription geminates spelled doubled singletons, transcription geminates spelled "ː", transcription syllable boundaries, transcription phones separated spaces (tokenised).
